Overview

Auxiliary R package for the assessment of JACUSA1.x and JACUSA2.x results.

Install

Install JACUSA2helper by either downloading a specific release or install it directly from the repository via devtools.

Download

  1. Download JACUSA2helper from releases
  2. Change to directory where JACUSA2helper was saved
  3. Start R
  4. Install downloaded package by running: install.packages("<DOWNLOADED-FILE>")

devtools

  1. Make sure, devtools is installed
  2. Start R
  3. Run install_github("dieterich-lab/JACUSA2helper")

Usage

Check JACUSA2helper doc.
